description:
Samsung Galaxy S21 5G Price in Bangladesh October 2024

The Samsung Galaxy S21 5G is now available in three variants (128/8GB,256/8GB RAM). Now, Galaxy S21 5G’s Price is 66,000 Taka in Bangladesh. Galaxy S21 5G has a 4000mAh battery with 25W fast charging. This device is running with Android 11 and powered by the Exynos 2100 – International, Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 – USA/China/Korea chipset.

Samsung Galaxy S21 5G highlight

Samsung Galaxy S21 5G will be launched in January 2021. The Galaxy S21 5G launched with model number SM-G991B, SM-G991B/DS. Firstly, Its dimensional measure is 151.7 x 71.2 x 7.9 mm and the weight is 169 grams. Secondly, the display of the Galaxy S21 5G is a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X panel with 1080 x 2400 pixels resolution. The display is protecting from the unknown. Thirdly and most importantly, It is powered by the Exynos 2100 – International, Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 – USA/China/Korea and running with Android 11. Moreover, it has up to an Octa-core (1×2.9 GHz Cortex-X1 & 3×2.80 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×2.2 GHz Cortex-A55) – International,Octa-core (1×2.84 GHz Kryo 680 & 3×2.42 GHz Kryo 680 & 4×1.80 GHz Kryo 680 – USA/China/Korea CPU.

Samsung Galaxy S21 5G phone has a quad-camera setup on the back. This formation consists of a 12MP telephoto, 64MP wide, 12MP ultrawide, camera. It has a 10MP selfie camera inside the notch of the display. The video recording capability is 1080p@30fps. According to its RAM and ROM, It has three (8GB/128/256GB) variants. On the other hand, it can support up to microSDXC on uses a dedicated slot. Certainly, Galaxy S21 5G has a 4000mAh battery with 25-watt fast charging. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, Galaxy S21 5G is 2G/3G/4G/5G supportable. The fingerprint sensor is under the display.

On the other hand, among the other features, there is WLAN, Bluetooth, FM Radio, and USB port.

Your question and our opinion about Samsung Galaxy S21 5G

Which question you will have about this phone. Let’s justify these. There we are including the major question and answers about this phone. So, let’s start now.

When it will released?

It will launch on January 2021.

What is the price of Samsung Galaxy S21 5G?

The price of Samsung Galaxy S21 5G is BDT 66,000.

How much RAM and ROM does it contain?

It has one variant 8GB in RAM & one variant of 128/256GB in ROM. But, overall you can get two variant (8GB/256GB, 8GB/256GB) in market

Which type of display panel used in it?

It comes with a 6.2″ Dynamic AMOLED 2X Display panel with 1080 x 2400 pixels resolution.

How is the processor and chipset?

It contains an Exynos 2100 – International, Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 – USA/China/Korea.

What is the camera and video capabilities?

The quad-camera setup on back 12MP+64MP+12MP and a 10MP selfie camera. The video recording capability is 4K@30fps, 1080p@30fps.

Dose it is support 5G network?

Yes, It is support 5G network with 2G, 3G and 4G.

How the battery capacity is?

The battery capacity is a 4000mAh Li-Polymer battery with 25W fast charging.

What sensors does this phone have?

Fingerprint, accelerometer, proximity, and compass sensor.

Which country and company manufactured it?

Samsung manufactured it and this phone is made in Korea.

Reason to Buy

In this paragraph, we are going to describe the important major to buy this. Why a person may buy this smartphone? Firstly, when anyone wants to buy a device they find out the premium things on the device according to their price. So, let us find out some eligible things which are in Galaxy S21 5G.

Our Verdict

In conclusion, we are giving our verdict on this device. If you want to buy the best 5G smartphone under 100K Taka. Then Samsung Galaxy S21 5G will in the first row among the best smartphones. Dear friends if you have an attraction to online games like Free Fire, PUBG Mobile, and so on then you can buy it. Because it has RAM and a well Processor using the Exynos 2100 – International, Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 – USA/China/Korea chipset. If you want a big back up on charge then you can buy this. Because it has a huge 4000mAh battery. In addition, it’s a 5G supportable smartphone. So, you can get good network facilities on it. However, it has a quad-cam setup with a 64MP primary camera. So, it’s the image and video capability may be well. Therefore, to judge all of these reasons you can buy this.

This stylish device has 13 MP, 2 MP, 2 MP QVGA in the back and an 8 MP on the front side. It was powered by a standard 5000 mAh Li-polymer battery.
